modconfig.configOPLevel.description: OP level required to edit Mod Config, including individual command configuration
command.description.back: Get or teleport to your death position
command.description.explosion: Create an explosion at a given distance with a given power
command.description.home: Set, get, or teleport to your Home Position
command.description.ignite: Set target on fire for a specified number of seconds
command.description.jump: Teleport to cursor position with a given distance
command.description.killitems: Kill all items lying on the ground
command.description.lightning: Strike a Lightning at your cursor position with a given distance
command.description.spawn: Get or teleport to your or the world's spawn point
message.command.hc.config.changedValue.c: [!] Now literally everyone can edit Mod Config
message.command.hc.config.printValue: Current %d value in Mod Config is: %d
message.command.opLevelChanged: Changed required OP level to %d for %d command
message.command.opLevelChanged.everyoneC: [!] Now literally everyone can use %d command
message.command.gm.target: Updated game mode to %d for %d player(s)
message.command.back.self: Teleported you to your death position
message.command.back.get.title: Your Death Position
message.command.home.notSet: Your Home Position is not set in this world. Set it with %d
message.command.home.teleported: Teleported you to your Home Position
message.command.home.get.title: Your Home Position
message.command.feed.self: You were fed and completely saturated
message.command.spawn.self.teleported: You were teleported to your Spawn Point
message.command.spawn.world.teleported: You were teleported to the World Spawn
message.command.spawn.self.get.title: Your Spawn Point
message.command.spawn.world.get.title: World Spawn Point
message.error.mod.disabled: Helpful Commands Mod is disabled in this world!
message.error.command.disabled: %d command is disabled in this world!
message.error.command.insufficientPrivil: You can't use %d command! It requires higher OP level (%d) than you currently have (%d)
message.error.config.insufficientPrivile: You can't configure Helpful Commands! This action requires higher OP level (%d) than you currently have (%d)
message.error.config.configOPLevel.insuf: Your OP level (%d) has to be higher or equal to the value that you are specifying (%d)!
message.error.command.explosion.explosio: Specified explosion power (%d) exceeds max value set in the Mod Config (%d)
message.error.command.spawn.self.notSet: Your Spawn Point is not set in this world
